32#ifndef _LINUX_PRINTK_H_
33#define _LINUX_PRINTK_H_
34
35#include <sys/param.h>
36#include <sys/systm.h>
37
38#define printk printf
39#define vprintk vprintf
40#define printk_once printf
41#define pr_err printf /* XXX */
42#define pr_cont printf /* XXX */
43#define pr_info printf /* XXX */
44#define pr_info_once printf /* XXX */
45#define pr_warn_once printf /* XXX */
46#define pr_notice printf /* XXX */
47#define pr_debug printf /* XXX */
48#define KERN_EMERG "kern emerg: "
49#define KERN_ALERT "kern alert: "
50#define KERN_CRIT "kern crit: "
51#define KERN_ERR "kern error: "
52#define KERN_WARNING "kern warning: "
53#define KERN_NOTICE "kern notice: "
54#define KERN_INFO "kern info: "
55#define KERN_DEBUG "kern debug: "
56#define KERN_CONT ""
57
58#define DUMP_PREFIX_NONE 0
59#define DUMP_PREFIX_OFFSET 1
60#define DUMP_PREFIX_ADDRESS 2
61
62static inline void
63hex_dump_to_buffer(const void *buf, size_t buf_size, int bytes_per_line,
64 int bytes_per_group, char *output, size_t output_size, bool ascii __unused)
65{
66 const uint8_t *bytes = buf;
67 size_t i = 0, n;
68
69 KASSERT(output_size >= 1);
70 KASSERT((bytes_per_line == 16) || (bytes_per_line == 32));
71 KASSERT(powerof2(bytes_per_group));
72 KASSERT(0 < bytes_per_group);
73 KASSERT(bytes_per_group <= 8);
74
75 output[output_size - 1] = '\0';
76 while (i < buf_size) {
77 n = snprintf(output, output_size, "%02x", bytes[i++]);
78 if (n >= output_size)
79 break;
80 output += n; output_size -= n;
81 if ((i == buf_size) || (0 == (i % bytes_per_line)))
82 n = snprintf(output, output_size, "\n");
83 else if ((0 < i) && (0 == (i % bytes_per_group)))
84 n = snprintf(output, output_size, " ");
85 else
86 n = 0;
87 if (n >= output_size)
88 break;
89 output += n; output_size -= n;
90 }
91}
92
93static inline void
94print_hex_dump(const char *level, const char *prefix, int prefix_type,
95 int bytes_per_line, int bytes_per_group, const void *buf, size_t buf_size,
96 bool ascii)
97{
98 const uint8_t *bytes = buf;
99 /* Two digits and one space/newline per byte, plus a null. */
100 char line[32*3 + 1];
101
102 KASSERT((bytes_per_line == 16) || (bytes_per_line == 32));
103 KASSERT(powerof2(bytes_per_group));
104 KASSERT(0 < bytes_per_group);
105 KASSERT(bytes_per_group <= 8);
106
107 while (0 < buf_size) {
108 const size_t n = MIN(buf_size, 32);
109
110 switch (prefix_type) {
111 case DUMP_PREFIX_OFFSET:
112 printf("%08zu: ", (bytes - (const uint8_t *)buf));
113 break;
114
115 case DUMP_PREFIX_ADDRESS:
116 printf("%p: ", bytes);
117 break;
118
119 case DUMP_PREFIX_NONE:
120 default:
121 break;
122 }
123
124 hex_dump_to_buffer(bytes, n, bytes_per_line, bytes_per_group,
125 line, sizeof(line), ascii);
126 KASSERT(0 < strnlen(line, sizeof(line)));
127 KASSERT(line[strnlen(line, sizeof(line)) - 1] == '\n');
128 printf("%s", line);
129
130 bytes += n;
131 buf_size -= n;
132 }
133}
134
135#endif /* _LINUX_PRINTK_H_ */
